BadgeDetail.Name: Morticer
BadgeDetail.Description: The earner of this badge has attended a full demonstration of correct machine use. They have demonstrated on multiple occasions the correct and safe use of a morticer. They have shown knowledge of basic maintenance of this machine including changing an auger and chisel blade. They are competent to use this tool in the workshop environment.

Task.Title: Morticer
Task.Body: Upload 2 photographs/videos demonstrating the safe use of a Morticer.
Task.HtmlBody: Upload 2 photographs/videos demonstrating the safe use of a Morticer.
Task.TextileBody: Upload 2 photographs/videos demonstrating the safe use of a Morticer.

Task.Title: Blade change
